title: Deadly Matrimony
overview: Based on an unpublished manuscript by Barbara Schaaf. A sleazy, Chicago, mob lawyer who bribes judges and fixes trials for organized crime figures, murders his wife in a jealous rage. A diligent detective attempts to expose the loathsome attorney as the killer but is stonewalled by crooked cops, silent witnesses and a corrupt judge. Undaunted, the determined cop uncovers the truth and gets his man.
